content:
As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future with certainty. However, history has shown that there have been periods of significant cultural and intellectual growth throughout human civilization. It is entirely possible that we may see such a growth again in our lifetime, given the rapid advancements in technology, medicine and communication. New developments could pave the way for new ways of thinking, new discoveries, and new artistic expressions.

Furthermore, there is still much to learn and discover in every field of knowledge. While it is true that some areas of knowledge may seem more stagnant than others, it is likely that there will always be space for innovation, new perspectives and original ideas. Discovery is a continual process, and there is always room for growth, adaptation and creativity, even in fields that appear to be well-explored. So, while we can't predict the future, we can remain hopeful that there is much more to be discovered and achieved in our lifetime.
